Verses: 1 isravel Puththirar Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappatta Naanootru Enbadhaam Varushaththilum, Saalomon Isravelinmel Raajaavaana Naalaam Varusham Seep Maadhamaagiya Irandaam Maadhaththilum, Avan Karththarin Aalayaththaik Kattaththodanginaan.
2 saalomon Raajaa Karththarukkuk Kattina Aalayam Arubadhu Muzhaneelamum, Irubadhu Muzha Agalamum, Muppadhu Muzha Uyaramumaayirundhadhu.
3 aalayamaagiya Andha Maaligaiyin Mugappile Avan Kattina Mandabam Aalayaththin Agalaththirku Sariyaai Irubadhumuzha Neelamum, Aalayaththukku Munne Paththumuzha Agalamumaayirundhadhu.
4 paarvaikkuk Kurugippogira Odukkamaana Jannalgalai Aalayaththirku Seyviththaan.
5 avan Dhevaalayaththin Suvarum Sannidhi Sthaanachchuvarumaagiya Aalayaththin Suvargalukku Aduththadhaai Sutrukkattugalaik Katti, Avaigalil Araigalai Sutrilum Undaakkinaan.

6 keezhe Irukkira Sutrukkattu Aindhu Muzha Agalamum, Naduve Irukkiradhu Aaru Muzha Agalamum, Moondraavadhaayirukkiradhu Ezhumuzha Agalamumaayirundhadhu; Avaigal Aalayaththinudaiya Suvargalile Thaangaadha Padikku Aalayaththai Sutrilum Purambe Ottuchchuvargalaik Kattuviththaan.

7 aalayam Kattappadugaiyil, Adhu Panitheerndhu Konduvarappatta Karkalaale Kattappattadhu; Aagaiyaal Adhu Kattappadugirapodhu, Suththigal Vaachchigal Mudhalaana Endha Iruppu Aayudhangalin Saththamum Adhile Ketkappadavillai.
8 nadu Araigalukkup Pogira Vaasarpadi Aalayaththin Valadhupuraththil Irundhadhu; Suzharpadigalaal Nadu Araigalukkum, Nadu Araigalilirundhu Moondraavadhu Araigalukkum Eruvaargal.
9 ivvidhamaai Avan Aalayaththaik Katti, Kedhurumara Uththirangalaalum Palagaigalaalum Aalayaththai Machchuppaavi Mudiththaan.
10 avan Aindhumuzha Uyaramaana Sutruk Kattugalai Aalayaththinmelengum Kattuviththaan; Avaigal Kedhurumarangalaal Aalayaththode Inaikkappattirundhadhu.
11 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Saalomonukku Undaayitru; Avar

12 nee En Kattalaigalinpadi Nadandhu, En Needhi Nyaayangalai Niraivetri, En Karpanaigalinpadiyellaam Nadandhu Kollumpadikku, Avaigalaik Kaikkondaal, Nee Kattugira Indha Aalayaththaik Kuriththu Naan Un Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhode Sonna En Vaarththaiyai Unnidaththil Niraivetri,
13 isravel Puththirar Naduvile Vaasampanni, En Janamaagiya Isravelaik Kaividaadhiruppen Endraar.
14 appadiye Saalomon Aalayaththaik Katti Mudiththaan.

15 aalayaththu Suvargalin Utpuraththai, Thalamthodangi Suvargalin Melmachchumattum, Kedhuruppalagaigalaal Moodi, Ippadi Utpuraththai Maravelaiyaakki, Aalayaththin Thalaththai Dhevadhaari Virutchangalin Palagaigalaal Thalavarisaippaduththinaan.

16 thalavarisai Thodangi Suvargalin Uyaramattum Aalayaththin Pakkangalaith Thodarndhirukkira Irubadhu Muzha Neelamaana Maraippaiyum Kedhuruppalagaigalaal Undaakki, Utpuraththai Magaa Parisuththamaana Sannidhi Sthaanamaagak Kattinaan.
17 adhin Munnirukkira Dhevaalayamaagiya Maaligai Naarpadhumuzha Neelamaayirundhadhu.
18 aalayaththirkul Irukkira Kedhurumarangalil Mokkugalum Malarndha Pookkalumaana Siththiravelai Seydhirundhadhu; Paarvaikku Oru Kallaagilum Kaanappadaamal Ellaam Kedhurumaramaayirundhadhu.
19 karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaip Pettiyai Vaikkiradharku Aalayaththukkulle Sannidhi Sthaanaththai Aayaththappaduththinaan.

20 sannidhi Sthaanam Munpuramattum Irubadhumuzha Neelamum, Irubadhu Muzha Agalamum, Irubadhumuzha Uyaramumaayirundhadhu; Adhaip Pasumpon Thagattaal Moodinaan; Kedhurumarap Palipeedaththaiyum Appadiye Moodinaan.
21 aalayaththin Utpuraththai Saalomon Pasumpon Thagattaal Moodi, Sannidhi Sthaanaththin Maraippukkum Pon Sangiligalaik Kurukke Pottu, Adhaip Pon Thagattaal Moodinaan.
22 ippadi Aalayam Muzhuvadhum Kattith Theerumattum, Avan Aalayam Muzhuvadhaiyum Pon Thagattaal Moodi, Sannidhi Sthaanaththirku Munbaaga Irukkira Palipeedaththai Muzhuvadhum Pondhakattaal Moodinaan.
23 sannidhi Sthaanaththil Olivamarangalaal Irandu Kerubeengalai Seydhu Vaiththaan; Ovvondrum Paththumuzha Uyaramaayirundhadhu.

24 kerubeenukku Irukkira Oru Settai Aindhu Muzhamum Kerubeenin Matra Settai Aindhu Muzhamumaai, Ippadi Oru Settaiyin Kadaisi Munaithodangi Matra Settaiyin Kadaisimunaimattum Paththu Muzhamaayirundhadhu.
25 matrak Kerubeenum Paththu Muzhamaayirundhadhu; Irandu Kerubeengalum Ore Alavum Ore Thittamumaayirundhadhu.
26 oru Kerubeen Paththumuzha Uyaramaayirundhadhu; Matrak Kerubeenum Appadiye Irundhadhu.

27 andhak Kerubeengalai Ul Aalayaththile Vaiththaan; Kerubeengalin Settaigal Viriththirundhadhinaal, Oru Kerubeenin Settai Orupakkaththu Suvarilum, Matrak Kerubeenin Settai Marupakkaththu Suvarilum Thodaththakkadhaayirundhadhu; Aalayaththin Nadumaiyaththil, Avaigalin Settaigal Ondrodondru Thodaththakkadhaayirundhadhu.
28 andhak Kerubeengalaip Pondhakattaal Moodinaan.
29 aalayaththin Suvargalaiyellaam Avan Sutrilum Ullum Purambumaagak Kerubeengalum Pereendhugalum Malarndha Pookkalumaana Siththirangalum Koththu Velaigalumaakkinaan.
30 ullum Purambumaayirukkira Aalayaththuth Thalavarisaiyaiyum Pondhakattaal Moodinaan.
31 sannidhi Sthaanaththin Vaasalukku Olivamarangalaal Rattaik Kadhavugalai Seydhaan; Mel Sattamum Nilaigalum Maraippin Alavil Aindhil Oru Pangaayirundhadhu.

32 olivamaramaana Andha Rattaik Kadhavugalil Avan Kerubeengalum Pereendhugalum Malarndha Pookkalumaana Siththirangalai Seydhu, Andhak Kerubeengalilum Pereendhugalilum Ponpadhiyaththakkadhaaip Pon Thagattaal Moodinaan.
33 ippadi Dhevaalayaththin Vaasalukkum Olivamara Nilaigalai Seydhaan; Adhu Suvar Alavil Naalaththoru Pangaayirundhadhu.
34 adhin Irandu Kadhavugalum Dhevadhaarip Palagaigalaal Seyyappattirundhadhu; Oru Kadhavukku Irandu Madippup Palagaigalum, Matra Kadhavugalukku Irandu Madippup Palagaigalum Irundhadhu.
35 avaigalil Kerubeengalum Pereendhugalum Malarndha Pookkalumaana Siththirangalukku Sariyaaga Seyyappatta Pon Thagattaal Avaigalai Moodinaan.
36 avan Utpraagaaraththai Moondru Varisai Vettina Karkalaalum, Oru Varisai Kedhurup Palagaigalaalum Kattinaan.
37 naalaam Varusham Seepmaadhaththile Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukku Asthibaaram Pottu,

38 padhinoraam Varusham Pool Ennum Ettaam Maadhaththile, Andha Aalayamuzhudhum Sagala Sattathittaththinpadiye Oru Pangum Kuraiyaamal Kattith Theerndhadhu; Avan Adhaik Kattimudikka Ezhuvarusham Sendradhu.
